title: Delta Force Xtreme
description:
Delta Force: Extreme sees the cream of the crop classic single and multiplayer missions from the original game return, using a specially optimized game engine. Improvements will include a complete graphics overhaul, including new renders, particle effects weather effects, as well as new content in the form of missions and online features. Delta Force: Extreme also includes over 25 co-op missions, online stat tracking and improved anti-cheat measures.

Hardware Requirements
Pentium III 1.2 GHZ or Higher; DirectX 9.0 AGP video card; 2 GB Free Hard Drive Space; 4X CD-ROM drive; 128 MB RAM
